subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel sprinted to a second straight stage victory in a wet third leg of the Giro d’Italia, while Michael Matthews retained the pink jersey.
snippet: Marcel Kittel sprinted to a second straight stage victory in a wet third leg of the Giro d’Italia, while Michael Matthews retained the pink jersey.
